overview: The live show of Ginger Wildheartâ€™s Songs & Words, featuring the stories behind all of his songs from the very beginning to the extremely successful 555%, as told by the man himself. No holds barred!  Recorded live at the Leicester Square Theatre London, Sunday 26th April 2015.  The full show plus bonus interview and behind the scenes footage.
title: Ginger Wildheart: Songs & Words
